article_title: The Morning Download: Staples CIO Says Data is Key to Battle with Amazon
article_text: “We coasted and lost our way and didn’t see the onslaught coming from Amazon,” says Staples CIO Tom Conophy. After a significant slide in revenue, Mr. Conophy says the company is back on the offensive, developing its own software for important functions like dynamic pricing.

twitter.description: "We coasted and lost our way and didn't see the onslaught coming from Amazon," says Staples CIO Tom Conophy. After a significant slide in revenue, Mr. Conophy says the company is back on the offensive, developing its own software for important functions like dynamic pricing.

article_summary:
“We coasted and lost our way and didn’t see the onslaught coming from Amazon,” says Staples CIO Tom Conophy.
After a significant slide in revenue, Mr. Conophy says the company is back on the offensive, developing its own software for important functions like dynamic pricing.
